movie_title: How to talk about something you've been working on in English
introduction: https://tinyurl.com/5x2jv42f ðŸ“š Click here to download your FREE 2000 English words for everyday lif

vocabulary.definition: to receive advantage or profit; to gain good or useful results
vocabulary.example: Sharing this video will benefit other learners who can gain valuable knowledge.

vocabulary.definition: causing bewilderment or perplexity; not clear or easy to understand
vocabulary.example: The new grammar rules are so confusing that many students struggle to grasp them.
The construction work on the bridge is continuing despite the bad weather.

vocabulary.definition: of great use or service; important and beneficial
vocabulary.example: Her experience working in marketing is valuable for our new project.

vocabulary.definition: the process of shortening a word or phrase by omitting sounds or letters
vocabulary.example: In 'I've' the apostrophe is a contraction representing 'I have'.

vocabulary.definition: to move or cause to move with short, quick movements from side to side
vocabulary.example: The toddler began to wiggle in excitement when he saw the puppy.
